msbt.message: Hey, I heard Tom Nook finally built you a house! How's it feel to have solid walls?I tell ya, tents are nice and all, but putting roots down? That's some fine livin', !
Your place is bigger'n ever! Unbelievably big, .What's it like, havin' so much space to stretch out in?<10_4 /> Ah, I'd probably waste the extra space if I had it.
Have you been to the remodeled Nook's Cranny yet, ?They've really spruced the place up. I almost like goin' shoppin' now!
Our museum turned out pretty spiffy!Never thought of myself as much of a museumgoer, but I'm impressed with the place so far, .

Since the tailors set up shop here, it's been easier findin' clothes that actually fit me right, . Dunno if you noticed, but I'm kinda irregularly shaped. So I appreciate clothin' that's less off-the-rack.
Just discovered that new incline It's great bein' able to reach higher ground on the island, . Now I can keep a better watch over , from on high!
